understated **bowen shawl** is a really lovely knit simply fabulous i say it is knitted mostly in relaxing garter stitches except for the bottom border which is done with a simple knit and purl stitch pattern and an interesting way to increase there is not only a lovely color contrast but also a welcomed break in textures the shape is a lovely oversized crescent and who doesn t like a crescent shaped shawl right my unblocked shawl as shown measures 99 in length and 17 5 in middle height the pattern is entirely written for your knitting pleasure **yarn** 3 easy care dk yarn cakes in as many colors 272 yards/100 grams a cake in a super soft acrylic #5 c1-marine c2-silver c3- charcoal used knit kits are waiting for you at ** yarnz2go 4 ** **notions** us size 10 6 mm circular needle 40 91 cm in length tapestry needle or crochet hook for finishing **gauge** 12 sts and 26 row in 4 of garter stitch counting 13 ridges **techniques** knitting purling changing colors increasing binding off
